title: Stealth's Corner of Peculiarities
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:midnight-rush]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="xtra-div-3"]]
Oh hi there! Didn't see you there. I'm [[*user Spacestealth]] also known as just Stealth, and this is my Corner of Curiosities. Come take a look at all the weird and wonderful sights! Take a seat on that beanbag, next to the nonconscious potions.

Sit back, relax and..

[[/div]]

+ HAVE FUN!

[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= STEALTH
|clearance= 5
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= Chokmah balls
|secondary-icon=http://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/shineshadowd%3Agyd4/Chhokmah.svg
|disruption-class= amida
|risk-class= critical
]]

[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="width:100%;"]]
[[image https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/2c/Needle_Galaxy_4565.jpeg style="width:50%;" link=#]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="width:100%;"]]
Picture of Evil Spacestealth
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
**SCPS:**

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7665 SCP-7665] - See Evil, Hear Evil, Speak No Evil** (Collaboration with [[*user Civil Western]] for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/remixcon2023 Remixcon2023])

**COMMENTARY:** My first (non deleted) article written for Remixcon2023. It was a remix of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-709 SCP-709], a not well known article that we believed could be improved, but more importantly it was a love letter to [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/taboo SCP-4000], one of our favourite articles. I highly recommend you check it out.

Despite the fact it got 50th place in the SCP category, I'm still really proud of how this turned out, especially the ending. I hope to write a continuation to this story some day.

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8299 SCP-8299] - TRUE NORTH STRONG AND FREE** (Collaboration with [[*user Lt Flops]] for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/deer-college-spring-cleaning-event Deer College Spring Cleaning Event)

**COMMENTARY:** So this is an article I put a lot of time and love in. I knew I wanted to participate in the Spring cleaning event as I always say yes to everything, but most of my drafts were under a year old.  When I realised people could donate drafts, I quickly looked for one. I found one but I eventually quit out of lack of motivation. Then I decided to take on this draft by [[*user Lt Flops]] and submitted on the day before the deadline.

Anyways the actual article itself is a somber story about a species of manatees, gradually dying out due to the actions of colonializations. This article is meant to pay homage to the First Nations, who are too often overlooked by most people. Even though I am not Canadian, I still decided to this as to spread knowledge. I also liked making the song at the end and I feel it fits perfectly with the image.
[[/div]]

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7608 SCP-7608] - Champion of Mankind** (Written for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pdcontest2025 Public Domain Con])

**COMMENTARY:** This was my first time participating in a team contest since departmentcon but luckily it went much better this time. Although I was worried I wouldn't get this finished in time, I still managed to complete it. It was a really fun experience and I'm so grateful for my two teammates. 

This article is different from most of my other articles as I tried creating a longer, more intense article than usual. Although there are some things I would change, I'm still really proud of this. 
+ Next up....!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

[[div class="document"]]
**TALES:**

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/friendly-rivalries Friendly Rivalries]**

**COMMENTARY:** So one day I noticed me and [[*user winkwonkboi]]'s departments were pretty similar and we both wanted a tag. So I decided to write this tale about learning how to relax. Go check out the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/anomalous-entity-engagement-division-hub AEED hub] if you want more of the AEED.

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dead-meat Dead Meat]**

**COMMENTARY:** This one. In my opinion is my most gruesome article I've written so far. After reading [[*user J Dune]]'s [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8876 SCP-8876], I felt terrible and I'm not even vegan. So I decided to write this in a day. There's a chance I might randomly delete this one day btw.
[[/div]]

+ You look pretty tired, unwind with these weird things:

[[div class="document"]]
**GOI FORMATS:**

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/new-purple-series-kaiju-defense-exoskeleton Anderson Robotics' Installation Guide: Your New Purple Series Kaiju Defense Exoskeleton!]**

**COMMENTARY:** So I suddenly got this idea one day and just decided to roll with it. It's a short story about Anderson Robotics trying to make a profit from the apocalypse in the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/war-on-all-fronts-hub War On All Fronts] canon. Not much else to say. One of my personal favourites.
[[/div]]

+ Okay that's pretty much all I have, now here's some random stuff!

[[div class="document"]]
**OTHER STUFF:**

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/department-of-entomology-hub Department of Entomology Hub]**

**COMMENTARY:** So after finishing the now deleted site dossier, I had a renewed interest in the Department of Entomology. Then I wrote this hub page to organize all the articles and characters. I'm so happy to hear about the positive reception this got and I'm in the process of writing more articles for this.

It's open to everyone, so if you have an idea, don't be scared to contact me for crit or if you want to run an idea by me.

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/stealth-s-corner-of-peculiarities Stealth's Corner of Peculiarities]**

**COMMENTARY:** Haha funny self reference.

[[/div]]

+ I also write stuff for the Wanderer's Library sometimes, here's a list of all my works so far!

[[div class="document"]]
**[https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/lost lost.]**

**COMMENTARY:** First post on WL. A short poem about where lost objects go. I liked having the freedom to write what I want here. Even though it's short, I still like it.
[[/div]]

+ Okay, now that's all my stuff. How about you read some reviews about my work?

[[div class="document"]]
**QUOTES:**

“Yeah, they’re pretty epic”  - [[*user cicada3301fan]]

"Spacestealth is optional, Spacerunandgun is forever." - [[*user Lemonsense]]

"I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot I hate Wikidot" - [[*user Civil Western]]

"who the hell are you" - [[*user Djkaktus]] [[footnote]] Definitely real [[/footnote]]

[[/div]]

+ Hmm, what else do people have on their author pages? Oh yeah recommendations, these aren't all of them but I still suggest you read some of these.

+ Since you've been so good and read all of this, I'll give you a reward. You can vandalise anything inside of this div.

[[div class="document"]]
**VANDALISE:**

hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii     SkeletonInAFridge was here

Where is the bathroom ~ //me//

I always come back.
[[/div]]

+ That's all, see you next time!

[[div class="document"]]
**Author Will**

If I die/get banned/disappear then all my coauthored articles go to their respective authors. Everything else the community can have.

[[/div]]
